about_the_game:
• Resource management: Construct essential buildings to gather key resources like food, wood, and metal, crucial for city survival and expansion.
  • Strategic defense: Use those resources to build defenses such as watchtowers, radar stations, and barricades to protect your city against threats.
  • Army recruitment: Allocate resources wisely to recruit and train a diverse army, from infantry to specialized units.
  • Dynamic construction: Adapt and evolve your city's infrastructure to meet the changing needs and challenges in a hostile post-apocalyptic environment.

  • In the middle of the action: As the architect, be at the heart of the action. Directly control your character to run between buildings, command your army, and confront enemies head-on, offering a unique blend of strategy and action.
  • Tactical combat system: Master a complex defense system where each choice counters specific enemy threats, crucial for survival.
  • Progressive night: Defend against intensifying attacks each night, with the difficulty escalating until you triumphantly clear the level.

  • Expansive upgrade tree: Dive into a comprehensive upgrade system, featuring new building types and numerous enhancements for your existing structures.
  • Interactive overworld: Navigate an overworld teeming with levels, secrets, and characters, each offering unique interactions and contributing to the overarching narrative.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux with Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux with Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300U or Ryzen 3 3300U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
